pages.text: Endergrades are fluffy flying creatures that can be found in the End. You can find them near Chorus Fruit.$(br2)Using a Saddle and a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/chorus_on_a_stick)Chorus Fruit on a Stick$(/l) you can ride them, like a pig on the Overworld.$(br2)They are slow but you can use them to fly on the End, that makes them very useful.
Be careful! If an $(l:patchouli:mobs/alexsmobs/enderiophage)Enderiophage$(/l) infects an Endergrade, It will die in a few minutes unless it eats a Chrous Fruit.
